entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
